price: 一体、彼ら（不信仰者*たち）は、ラクダがいかに創られたのか、見て（考え）ないのか？
arabic: أَفَلَا يَنظُرُونَ إِلَى ٱلۡإِبِلِ كَيۡفَ خُلِقَتۡ

version.title: Japanese translation - Saeed Sato
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Japanese by Saeed Sato. printed in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: afalā yanẓurūna ilā al-ibili kayfa khuliqat
